properties.entry: UPDATE TBL_STATUS SET STATUS_RENT = ?, STATUS_RESERVE = ? , DATE = ? WHERE ISBN = ?
UPDATE TBL_STATUS SET STATUS_RENT = ?, STATUS_RESERVE = DEFAULT, DATE = NULL WHERE ISBN = ?
SELECT A.* , B.STATUS_RENT, B.STATUS_RESERVE FROM TBL_BOOK A JOIN TBL_STATUS B ON A.ISBN = B.ISBN WHERE A.SUBJECT = ?
SELECT A.* , B.STATUS_RENT, B.STATUS_RESERVE FROM TBL_BOOK A JOIN TBL_STATUS B ON A.ISBN = B.ISBN
